column5: Ok, I think I know what it is but confirm it for me.  either dead shad, sucker or?  need to know for the spring trip  thanks
Could be any legal dead baitfish, but suckers and ciscos are most common.
Bait, that is dead.  Just a guess?
http://www.freshwater-fishing-canada.com/c...ng_deadbait.htm    http://www.hooklinks.co.uk/pike/navigation...l?=inserts.html    Hope that answers ur question for ya.
